author: meowbroski
content: Hi, I'm new to this server. I basically joined this server because I'm doing my Bachelor thesis in CS about blockchain and Ethereum's scalability

author: meowbroski
content: I am new to Blockchain and Ethereum in general, have been learning alot lately. My goal is to start benchmarking Ethereums scalability and implement some theoretical designs to analyze the difference in performance when it comes to scalability

author: meowbroski
content: I am having an extremely hard time navigating through this server and I have been here for a few days, I believe the fault is with me, probably because I'm new to this subject in general.

author: meowbroski
content: Anyways, I'm willing to learn more... But just to be sure, am I in the right place?

author: meowbroski
content: or maybe I have misunderstood the point of this server?
